resources.string: Block ads in just a couple steps, starting by choosing a blocking mode:

Fast mode uses our default filtering rules.

Faster (beta) uses a small amount of your background bandwidth to crawl the web and find more ads to filter.

You can switch anytime by going to About or can read our full terms and privacy policy first.

Go to your home screen > Internet > ☰ > Ad blockers then toggle Adblock Fast on.

To unblock ads, come back to this app then tap the Adblock Fast logo.
Adblock Fast requires Samsung Internet 4.0+, which you don’t seem to have.
Install or update to the latest version of the Samsung Internet browser then come back to this app for instructions on how to block ads.

Adblock Fast should also be kept up to date to block new ad types.

Would you like to be notified (infrequently) as soon as important updates are available?
Adblock Fast will fetch the latest ad domains to filter in a moment …
If you do have Samsung Internet 4.0+, <font color="#de0421"><u>dismiss this dialog permanently</u></font> to finish your setup.
If you have questions or comments, you can follow and message us on Facebook or on X.
Adblock Fast가 필터링할 새 광고 도메인을 검색 중입니다.
